metadata.synopsis: a drow commander barks orders to an assembled raiding party, preparing them for a raid

0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
0.text: We will strike in the name of the Absolute!
0.context: NodeContext: speaking to subordinates before setting out on a raid - projecting her voice to the group who are arrayed before her

1.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
1.text: If you fail me, the spiders will feed on your bones!
1.context: NodeContext: speaking to subordinates before setting out on a raid - projecting her voice to the group who are arrayed before her

3.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
3.text: You follow my lead on this raid, creatures!
3.context: NodeContext: speaking to subordinates before setting out on a raid - projecting her voice to the group who are arrayed before her. 'Creatures' said with disgust

2.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
2.text: Do not even bleed without my permission!
2.context: NodeContext: speaking to subordinates before setting out on a raid - projecting her voice to the group who are arrayed before her
